sub_title: Owner at Beleef Het Verleden (Experience The Past), public historian, expert in historical costumes, live costumed interpretation, historical events, historical productions and education.
summary:
Experience the Past: to make history matter for a general public!

It is my mission to educate people through costumed live interpretation, an exciting and interactive way to experience history as it might have been.

I help museums, towns or castles to create memorable historical events. I help schools to create history lessons that speak to the imagination of children and that use all the senses to make a strong learning impact. As an academic historian I do the research on these sites and their historical characters to enable my team of interpreters to make a memerable event that is historically as authentic as possible.

As a result of years of research and practice in this field, I am lecturing at conferences and universities on public and living history. My passion for costume making showed the way to lecturing on costumes from Roman times to the early Twentieth Century. 

Old and young, my public never fails to inspire me. The greatest moments are in a one-to-one conversation (as a historical character) when you see the twinkle in the eyes of educative amusement. 

The school programs that I am running cover the period from Roman Times to the Twentieth Century. My team of freelancers bring the past alive, visiting the schools as an historical character and bringing as much props (replica's) from the time as possible to make the educational experience complete. We always strive for including all the senses as it has been proven to be one of the best learning methods. 

- Do you wish to have more visitors?
- Do you want them to have an interactive experience?
- Do you want to teach as well as entertain them? 
- Do you want them to remember their visit forever?

Please contact me at info@beleefhetverleden.nl and check out: www.beleefhetverleden.nl / www.experiencethepast.org.

treasury_media.title: Trailer Beleef Het Verleden met Lotte - educatief filmprogramma
treasury_media.description: Educatief filmprogramma inclusief lesbrieven, geschikt voor basisscholen, groep 5 t/m8. Betreft de historische perioden: prehistorie, Romeinse tijd en middeleeuwen. Leverbaar vanaf 11 mei 2015.

treasury_media.title: Beleef Het Verleden - Historisch bal en diner in 1813, Keetje Hodshon huis
treasury_media.description: Een evenement van Beleef Het Verleden. Dagprogramma: gekostumeerde rondleiding in het Teylers museum, gevolgd door een historische dansworkshop, een diner in de prachtige neoclassistische stijlkamers van het Hodshon huis en een historisch bal op dezelfde locatie.

profile_positions.company: Beleef Het Verleden / Experience The Past
profile_positions.description:
Experience the Past: to make history matter for a general public!


- Heritage Education and Interpretation
Check"http://www.beleefhetverleden.nl/historische-personages/ 

- Lecturer on Public History, Living History and Historical Costumes
  For more information see: http://www.beleefhetverleden.nl/lezingen-2/ 

- Organiser historical events: Historical Dinners, Balls set in the 18th and 19th centuries, Vintage Parties but also Crafts Markets
See: http://www.beleefhetverleden.nl/historische-feesten/ 
  
- School programs: historical characters in role in the class room
http://www.beleefhetverleden.nl/educatie/ 


Goals: to make people experience the past in an educational and interactive way.

Specialties: public history and living history: lecturing, first and third person interpretation, event organisation and management, conference organisation, museum consultant
